body_html: Any chance of re-opening this issue? As pointed out, a number of SoTA models use these group convolutions. Further per this comment, cuDNN 7 now supports group convolutions as a primitive. It seems like exposing a primitive op that handles these convolutions makes sense.

body: Any chance of re-opening this issue? As pointed out, a number of SoTA models use these group convolutions. Further [per this comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12052#issuecomment-320465264), cuDNN 7 now supports group convolutions as a primitive. It seems like exposing a primitive op that handles these convolutions makes sense.
